mapper.select: select m.*, s.user_id, t.*, c.tch_file_rename from market m left outer join membership s on(m.mk_writer = s.user_no) left outer join mk_thumb t on(m.mk_no = t.mk_no) left outer join teacherfile c on(m.mk_writer = c.user_no) where m.mk_no = #{mkno}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum no, t.* FROM ( SELECT * from MARKET m LEFT JOIN MK_THUMB f ON(m.mk_no = f.mk_no) LEFT JOIN membership s ON(m.mk_writer = s.user_no) WHERE m.mk_state != 2 AND MK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY m.MK_NO desc ) t ) x WHERE no between #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT count(*) from MARKET m WHERE m.mk_state != 2 AND MK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into market(mk_no ,mk_title,mk_content, mk_writer, mk_price) values (#{mkNo}, #{mkTitle}, #{mkContent}, #{mkWriter}, #{mkPrice})
insert into mk_thumb(mk_thumb_no, mk_no ,mk_thumb_org, mk_thumb_rename) values (mk_thumb_SEQ.nextval, #{mkNo}, #{originFileName}, #{renameFileName})
insert into mk_file(mk_file_no, mk_no ,mk_file_org, mk_file_rename) values (mk_file_SEQ.nextval, #{mkNo}, #{originFileName}, #{renameFileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET mk_state = 1 WHERE mk_no = #{mkno}
UPDATE market SET mk_state = 2 WHERE mk_no = #{mkno}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.user_id, t.tch_file_rename FROM mk_comm c INNER JOIN membership m ON(m.user_no = c.mk_user_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN teacherfile t ON(m.user_no = t.user_no) WHERE mk_no = #{mkno}
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET mk_title = #{mkTitle}, mk_content = #{mkContent}, mk_price = #{mkPrice} WHERE mk_no = #{mkNo}
